page.title: 07Littlemoor
page.content: For many years Littlemoor was a large housing estate with very few amenities,surrounded by countryside and seemingly cut off from the rest of Weymouth. Recently,it has been the site of major developments in both housing and services.A large supermarket and shopping area was built which now draws in people from outside Littlemoor.Houses,play areas and a club have been completed. A new Health Centre is nearing completion and shortly a Church is to be constucted nearby.Littlemoor Primary School has been enlarged to cater for the extra children now living in the area.
